seed_pair.known: 我还不知道怎么说足够多不同的词。
seed_pair.target: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我不是在试着尽快完成。
recent_seed_pairs.target: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
recent_seed_pairs.target: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 他上周想给他的朋友写封信。
recent_seed_pairs.target: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
recent_seed_pairs.target: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我们想多给你一点时间。
recent_seed_pairs.target: We wanted to give you a little more time.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
recent_seed_pairs.target: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
recent_seed_pairs.target: So I can remember how to say a few words.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
recent_seed_pairs.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 当你理解足够多的词的时候很有趣。
recent_seed_pairs.target: It's interesting when you understand enough words.

recent_seed_pairs.known: 我知道下周我需要做什么。
recent_seed_pairs.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.
